text:
Hello developers!
Is there a way to create a multi-language variation for a blog, in a way that it creates variants for all the posts?

When I try to retrieve the new version of the language switcher module using `hs fetch @HubSpot/language_switcher.module --assetVersion=1` on an account with the old language switcher, it still retrieves the old language switcher. Anyone else have this issue?

It looks like you can’t retrieve the new version using the CLI at all. Even after making a brand new account, the CLI always retrieved the old version.

To get the new version of the language switcher, I had to create a new account, use design tools to clone a copy of the new version, then fetch that copy. Not exactly the most elegant fix, but I hope it’s helpful for anyone who also runs into this issue.
